title.value: Increase of the efficiency of long-term credits use as a measure to the reduce state support
Повышение эффективности использования долгосрочных кредитов как мера сокращения прямой бюджетной поддержки

journal.title: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of Belarus. Agrarian Series

person.name: Kazakevich, I.A., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Institute of System Studies in Agro - Industrial Complex

abstract.value: Credits, especially long-term loans appear the most effective tools aimed on formation of productive capabilities of real sector of economy, supplying permanent capital transfer and permitting mobilization of resources for emergent needs. Within the framework of integration Belarus undertakes to reduce measures of the state support which have a distorting influence on trade. It requires developing new approaches to subsidization of agriculture, including the sphere of credits. Taking into account the international practices and the existing economic conditions, the approach to grant soft long-term credits on the competitive basis using the rating system is proposed. The proposals to organize a competition of investment projects on the basis of definite criteria are made; the calculation of the efficiency of this approach is stated.
